sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Procter & Gamble ( PG ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.7%.
Year to date, Procter & Gamble has lost about 11.5% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is JPMorgan Chase ( JPM ), trading down 1.2%.
JPMorgan Chase is showing a gain of 6.3% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Microsoft Corporation ( MSFT ), trading down 1.1%, and Pfizer ( PFE ), trading up 0.6% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
